name: Super Adventure World - Jungle
description:
Super Adventure World is a classic platform game with a journey of super boy that brings your childhood back. This classic game will make you addict to.

In the super jungle world, You must smash enemies to pass so many threats . With familiar characters.

run and collect coins, power-up to fight with 9 bosses in 5 worlds.

Features :
- Great graphics and music.
- Over 20 enemies and power up obstacles
- 100 free levels with 5 worlds and 9 bosses to fight and more coming soon.
- Tricky monsters: snails, spiders, scorpion, carnivorous flower and so many other enemies...destroy them with jungle boy

Super Adventure World or jungle adventure is a journey of super Jungle boy. In heat jungle, You must pass so much threats to run to target world. On his road, you can use weapon to kill monster but weapon is hidden in somewhere.
